data.title: Which is better, Burnout Legends or Burnout Dominator?
data.text:
Ooh, I give Legends the lead for having Crash Mode even though Dominator has slightly more interesting tracks (but the shimmering in the scenery bugs me).

Overall, I still say Burnout Legends is more fun.

[quote name='Hibiwa']Ooh, I give Legends the lead for having Crash Mode even though Dominator has slightly more interesting tracks (but the shimmering in the scenery bugs me).

Overall, I still say Burnout Legends is more fun.[/quote]

Cool.

I had bought Legends last night and didn't even realize there was another Burnout game until after the fact.

Good choice. Might as well save another $5 since you already bought it. The PriceGrabber bonus is still up for grabs.

I'd say Legends, it has much better gameplay modes and looks a bit cleaner.

Dominator isn't a bad game though.

I've had both and Legends is much better. I don't like the Boost system in Dominator.

Isn't Legends essentially a remake of Burnout 3 while Dominator's a love note to Burnout 2? That would mean that whatever style of Burnout you prefer is the game you should get. I didn't get into the series until 3, so Legends is the game I'd get.

Looks like I made the right choice. Burnout 3 was the first I played.
